column4: I have a CD, and i want to turn that CD into an ISO image. Any idea how to?
yes, burn it as an image
so much it does work :)
what version of ubuntu are you using'¿
Ubuntu 9.10
are you using the midori PPA¿
https://launchpad.net/~midori/+archive/ppa and it recomends also https://launchpad.net/~webkit-team/+archive/ppa
i get this ever Error: need a repository as argument
i get this ever Error: need a repository as argument
sorry, the first is ppa:midori/ppa , not ppa:midori/ :S
i get the same error
whad do you get with: sudo add-apt-repository ppa:midori/ppa  ¿¿
http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/440699/
that only mean the gpg server is down, you can add the key some other day
So it won't work today? (Sorry i'm a bit slow, just came out of surgery)
sudp add-apt-repository ppa:webkit-team/ppa | and you will have everything needed to update midori and webkit
yes, it will work; you will only get a message that there is no GPG key. you use the GPG key to say the system that it is a safe repository
how do i do that?
open your update maanger, reload, you wll see updates for midori and webkit aviable
i only see one update for google chrome
mmm it should work, what about: sudo apt-get update  ¿¿
it throws errors with the webkit team ppa
don't worry i'll figure it out later
